definition: (of the moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon increases, the application of wax to a surface
details:
adjective
- (of the moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon increases
= example: (of the moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon increases
noun
- the application of wax to a surface
- a gradual increase in magnitude or extent
= example: a gradual increase in magnitude or extent
